title: Episode 14: Black Ariel
description:
Ms. Pat explains edges to White Boy Chris Spangle. He then shares the time he went to a black barbershop. Deon Curry wants everyone to tip. By popular demand, we cover black Ariel. Nikia calls in and mocks Ms. Pat's wig. 
- Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/patdown
- Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/patdown
- Website: https://www.mspatcomedy.com/
